name: flower drawstring pouch
notes:
this crochet flower drawstring pouch is made with 2 granny squares and has a drawstring closure. you can make your pouch with a flower on both sides, but i have a solid granny square pattern that will fit perfectly for a plain back! use this cute crochet pouch to hold smaller things in your bag or to use as a gift bag!


materials:

* 30 grams of medium weight yarn yarn in 3 different colors
   * flower center color yarn
   * flower petal color yarn
   * base color yarn
* 5mmÂ clover amour crochet hook
* scissors
* yarn needle

dimensions:

* granny square: 11 centimeters wide x 11 centimeters long (4.3 x 4.3 inches)
* overall: 11 centimeters wide x 14.5 centimeters long (4.3 x 5.7 inches)
